metadata.title: Seasonal Mean Surface Weather for the Bering Sea and Sea of Okhotsk (pub. 1943)

creators.name: National Climatic Data Center (NCDC), National Environmental Satellite, Data

metadata.description:
Publication Title: Seasonal climatic variations in Bering Sea and Sea of Okhotsk (pub.1943). 

Typescript (carbon copies).

Contains seasonal mean cloud total, fog, precipitation, gale frequencies, temperatures, and wind direction and speed. Text describes fog conditions.  

Available from the NOAA Library System: URL http://www.lib.noaa.gov/.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: This publication is in the National Climatic Data Center's Foreign Data Library, and is one of many books, atlases, maps, charts and other printed materials received by the NCDC from many nations over the years.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None Planned

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
